Enjoy SXSW! No meetup this month.

Hey y’all! As we mentioned in our last update, we will be skipping a March meetup due to SXSW. Enjoy if you’re attending!

In the meantime, we recommend you consider submitting talks to some upcoming conferences!

MacDevOps – June 5-6, 2017, Vancouver Canada, Early Bird Tickets are CAD $265 til March 11, 2017.

MacDeployment – June 8-9, 2017, Calgary Canada, Tickets available soon.

Penn State Macadmins Conference – Call for Proposals open! until April 4, 2017.

X World - June 29-30, 2017, Syndey, Australia. Call for presenters is now open and closes April 24, 2017.

If you’d like to speak at a future meetup in Austin please let us know.
